completeListOfAbilities.name: BRV Attack
completeListOfAbilities.desc: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV

completeListOfAbilities.name: HP Attack
completeListOfAbilities.desc: Expends BRV to deal HP damage

completeListOfAbilities.name: Elixir Field

ailments.name: MAX BRV Up
ailments.desc: MAX BRV Up: Raises MAX BRV

completeListOfAbilities.name: Riddle of Fire
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Grants party BRV based on own ATK
Self: 5 turns Fists of Fire
High turn rate
Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning、 support
Becomes Fire Tackle while Fists of Fire active

ailments.name: Fists of Fire
ailments.desc: Fists of Fire: Raises own MAX BRV、 ATK; restores a certain amount of party's BRV; raises party's INT BRV (does not stack)

completeListOfAbilities.name: Fire Tackle
completeListOfAbilities.desc: Grants party BRV based on own ATK\n2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack\nDeals 20% HP damage to non-targets

completeListOfAbilities.name: HP Attack+
completeListOfAbilities.desc: Increases BRV based on ATK\nMelee BRV attack + HP attack\nDeals 20% HP damage to non-targets

completeListOfAbilities.name: Brotherhood & the Forbidden Chakra
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Increases BRV based on ATK
Self: 6 turns Brotherhood buff
Triggers the Forbidden Chakra (5-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; deals proportionate HP damage to each target) after use
Extends active Fists of Fire duration 1 turn

While Brotherhood & the Forbidden Chakra equipped:
 • Abilities increase special effect Chakra by 1 (limit 5; abilities changed from BRV Attack、 HP Attack excluded)
 • Ally abilities increase special effect Chakra by 1 while Brotherhood buff active (limit 5)
 • Becomes Brotherhood & the Forbidden Chakra+ while special effect Chakra at 5; reduces special effect Chakra by 5 after use

completeListOfAbilities.name: Brotherhood & the Forbidden Chakra+
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Increases BRV based on ATK
Self: 6 turns Brotherhood buff
Triggers the Forbidden Chakra+ (5-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 250%; deals proportionate HP damage to each target) after use
Extends active Fists of Fire duration 1 turn
Reduces special effect Chakra by 5
Does not increase special effect Chakra after use

While Brotherhood & the Forbidden Chakra equipped:
 • Abilities increase special effect Chakra by 1 (limit 5; abilities changed from BRV Attack、 HP Attack excluded)
 • Ally abilities increase special effect Chakra by 1 while Brotherhood buff active (limit 5)

completeListOfAbilities.name: Purification
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Increases BRV based on ATK
Instant turn rate
Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning、 support
Reduces special effect Chakra by 5
Next turn after use does not consume ability use count

ailments.name: Siphon
ailments.desc: Siphon: Does not consume use count

completeListOfAbilities.name: Brotherhood & the Forbidden Chakra
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Increases BRV based on ATK
Self: 6 turns Brotherhood buff
Triggers the Forbidden Chakra (5-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; moderately increased BRV damage with critical hits; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; deals proportionate HP damage to each target) after use
Extends active Fists of Fire duration 1 turn

While Brotherhood & the Forbidden Chakra equipped:
 • Abilities increase special effect Chakra by 1 (limit 5; abilities changed from BRV Attack、 HP Attack excluded)

 • Becomes Brotherhood & the Forbidden Chakra+、 BRV Attack、 BRV Attack+ become Purification while special effect Chakra at 5; reduces special effect Chakra by 5 after use

passives.name: Mighty Elixir Field
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Elixir Field
passives.short_desc: Mighty Elixir Field: Increases BRV damage dealt with Elixir Field

passives.name: All Break Boost Up
passives.desc: Marginally raises party's Break Bonus upon inflicting Break
passives.short_desc: All Break Boost Up: Raises party's Break Bonus

passives.name: Speed Buff
passives.desc: Slightly raises SPD with active buff
passives.short_desc: Speed Buff: Raises SPD

passives.name: Mighty Fire Tackle
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Fire Tackle
passives.short_desc: Mighty Fire Tackle: Increases BRV damage dealt with Fire Tackle

passives.name: Back Attack
passives.desc: Marginally increases BRV damage dealt when attacking an enemy not targeting self
passives.short_desc: Back Attack: Increases BRV damage dealt

passives.name: Charged Elixir Field
passives.desc: Elixir Field use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Elixir Field: Raises use count of Elixir Field

passives.name: Ability Attack Bonus
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt during ability chain\n*Also applies to abilities changed from BRV Attack、 HP Attack
passives.short_desc: Ability Attack Bonus: Increases BRV damage dealt

passives.name: Charged Riddle of Fire
passives.desc: Riddle of Fire use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Riddle of Fire: Raises use count of Riddle of Fire

passives.name: In Crimson It Began
passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV、 ATK while Fists of Fire active
passives.short_desc: In Crimson It Began: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Buff Boost Speed
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV、 slightly raises SPD with active buff
passives.short_desc: Buff Boost Speed: Raises MAX BRV、 SPD

passives.name: Elixir Field Extension
passives.desc:
When using Elixir Field:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • MAX BRV Up、 ATK Up duration +5
passives.short_desc: Elixir Field Extension: Boost to Elixir Field

passives.name: Buffed Initial Attack
passives.desc: Moderately raises INT BRV、 ATK with active buff
passives.short_desc: Buffed Initial Attack: Raises INT BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Riddle of Fire Extension
passives.desc:
Riddle of Fire use +2

When using Riddle of Fire:
 • Fists of Fire duration +5
 • Turn rate becomes instantaneous

When using Fire Tackle:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

While Fists of Fire active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (increases BRV based on ATK before HP attack + melee BRV attack; deals 20% HP damage to non-targets)
passives.short_desc: Riddle of Fire Extension: Boost to Riddle of Fire

passives.name: Tenacity Brilliance
passives.desc: Slightly raises INT BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Tenacity Brilliance: Raises INT BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Fists of Fire Longer Attack Extension
passives.desc: When using Fists of Fire Longer Attack:\n • Slight raised ATK boost
passives.short_desc: Fists of Fire Longer Attack Extension: Boost to Fists of Fire Longer Attack

passive.name: Fists of Fire Longer Attack Growth
passive.desc: Fists of Fire Longer Attack use +1\n\nFists of Fire Longer Attack effect duration +2
passive.short_desc: Fists of Fire Longer Attack Growth: Boost to Fists of Fire Longer Attack

passive.name: All Break Hit Attack Longer
passive.desc: After inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break:\n • Raises party's ATK by 5% for 6 turns
passive.short_desc: All Break Hit Attack Longer: Raises party's ATK

passive.name: Ala Mhigan
passive.desc:
When using Elixir Field:
 • BRV damage boost
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • MAX BRV Up、 ATK Up boost
passive.short_desc: Ala Mhigan: Boost to Elixir Field

passive.name: Beneath Freedom's Banner
passive.desc:
When using Riddle of Fire:
 • Boost to BRV granted based on ATK
 • Fists of Fire boost

When using Fire Tackle:
 • Boost to BRV granted based on ATK
 • BRV damage boost
 • Increased HP damage to non-targets
passive.short_desc: Beneath Freedom's Banner: Boost to Riddle of Fire

passive.name: Stormblood
passive.desc: May equip EX ability Brotherhood & the Forbidden Chakra\nAdds special effect Chakra while Brotherhood & the Forbidden Chakra equipped
passive.short_desc: Stormblood: May equip Brotherhood & the Forbidden Chakra

passives.name: Mighty The Forbidden Chakra
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with The Forbidden Chakra、 The Forbidden Chakra+
passives.short_desc: Mighty The Forbidden Chakra: Increases BRV damage dealt with The Forbidden Chakra、 The Forbidden Chakra+

passives.name: Stormblood BRV++
passives.desc: While equipping EX weapon Jikki (XIV) or passive ability Stormblood:\n • BRV Attack、 BRV Attack+ become Purification (removes BRV attack; increases BRV based on ATK; instant turn rate; does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning、 support; reduces special effect Chakra by 5; next turn after use does not consume ability use count) while special effect Chakra at 5
passives.short_desc: Stormblood BRV++: Enables Purification while Chakra at 5

passives.name: Brotherhood & the Forbidden Chakra Recast Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises recast speed of Brotherhood & the Forbidden Chakra
passives.short_desc: Brotherhood & the Forbidden Chakra Recast Up: Raises recast speed of Brotherhood & the Forbidden Chakra

passive.name: Stormblood Extension
passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Brotherhood & the Forbidden Chakra
passive.short_desc: Stormblood Extension: Boost to Brotherhood & the Forbidden Chakra

passives.name: The Forbidden Chakra Mighty Critical Hit
passives.desc: When using The Forbidden Chakra、 The Forbidden Chakra+:\n • Moderately increased BRV damage with critical hits
passives.short_desc: The Forbidden Chakra Mighty Critical Hit: Boost to The Forbidden Chakra

passives.name: The Forbidden Chakra Force
passives.desc: When using The Forbidden Chakra、 The Forbidden Chakra+:\n • Tremendous BRV damage boost
passives.short_desc: The Forbidden Chakra Force: Boost to The Forbidden Chakra

passives.name: Brotherhood Buff Up Starting
passives.desc: Slight raised MAX BRV、 ATK boost from Brotherhood buff\n\n6 turns Brotherhood buff at start of quest
passives.short_desc: Brotherhood Buff Up Starting: Boost to Brotherhood; Brotherhood buff at start of quest

passives.name: The Forbidden Chakra Advance
passives.desc: Moderately raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV when using The Forbidden Chakra、 The Forbidden Chakra+
passives.short_desc: The Forbidden Chakra Advance: Boost to The Forbidden Chakra
